snippet: Bruno Mars, the R&B producer-singer-songwriter, synthesized styles across decades in his show at Barclays Center.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews performance by R&B singer Bruno Mars at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Bruno Mars, the R&B producer-singer-songwriter, synthesized styles across decades in his show at Barclays Center.
